content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5), boiler (position -4.5, 23.0), and offshore pump (position -7.5, 25.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network and has no input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace (position 0, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5, 5) and a furnace (position 5, 5)

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups:
- PipeGroup (position -9.5, -6.5) with fluid system 14953
- PipeGroup (position -4.5, 19.5) with fluid system 14960 (full output)
- PipeGroup (position -15.5, 23.5) with fluid system 14961 (empty)
- PipeGroup (position -18.5, 25.5) with fluid system 14967 (empty)
- PipeGroup (position -21.5, 28.5) with fluid system 14971 (empty)
- PipeGroup (position -20.5, 29.5) with fluid system 14970 (empty)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position y1 to the assembling machine at position z1

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to pick up entities
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to pick up exists at the specified position. Double-check the coordinates before executing the pickup command.

### Errors when placing new electric poles
- Make sure to check if the target position for the new electric pole is valid and not occupied by another entity. 

### Errors with undefined variables
- Always define your variables before using them in commands. In this case, ensure that 'new_pole' is properly initialized before trying to connect it to other entities.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Verify that the entities you are trying to connect are within range and that you have the correct references to their positions.
